snippet: There have been 120,000 suspected cases of dengue reported across Central America so far in the season.
abstract: Central America is on track to have one of its worst years ever for dengue, prompting governments across region to mobilize against mosquito-borne virus; 120,000 suspected cases have been reported so far in the season.
lead_paragraph: There have been 120,000 suspected cases of dengue reported across Central America so far in the season.

headline.main: Governments in Central America Mobilize to Fight Dengue Virus
headline.print_headline: Governments in Central America Mobilize to Fight Dengue Virus
